snippets.name: 1p-get-item
snippets.text:
unset OP_CONNECT_HOST OP_CONNECT_TOKEN
op item get "$1" --vault "$2" --format json

snippets.name: 1p-get-password
snippets.text:
unset OP_CONNECT_HOST OP_CONNECT_TOKEN
op item get "$1" --vault "$2" --field password

snippets.name: 1p-vault-list
snippets.text:
unset OP_CONNECT_HOST OP_CONNECT_TOKEN
op vault list
